title: $:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory
author: Thomas Elmiger
description: MyStory – replacement sidebar tab for Open
name: MyStory
text:

one" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/Buttons/InsertAbove": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/Buttons/InsertAbove", "caption": "{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Caption}}", "created": "20190128201124494", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Hint}}", "modified": "20190426131037352", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/InStoryControls", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n\n<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Caption}} class=<>>\n<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/language/DefaultNewTiddlerTitle}} $savetitle=\"$:/temp/new-tiddler-above\"/>\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/StoryList\" $subfilter=\"+[insertbefore:currentTiddler{$:/temp/new-tiddler-above}]\"/>\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-edit-tiddler\" $param={{$:/temp/new-tiddler-above}}/>\n{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-above}}\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/Buttons/InsertBelow": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/Buttons/InsertBelow", "caption": "{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertBelow/Caption}}", "created": "20190128171145652", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertBelow/Hint}}", "modified": "20190426131037346", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/InStoryControls", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n\n<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/InsertBelow/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/InsertBelow/Caption}} class=<>>\n<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/language/DefaultNewTiddlerTitle}} $savetitle=\"$:/temp/new-tiddler-below\"/>\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/StoryList\" $subfilter=\"[{$:/temp/new-tiddler-below}] +[putafter]\"/>\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-edit-tiddler\" $param={{$:/temp/new-tiddler-below}}/>\n{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-below}}\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/InStoryControls/ViewTemplate": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/InStoryControls/ViewTemplate", "created": "20190128212533801", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037339", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define config-title()\n$:/config/InStoryControls/Visibility/$(listItem)$\n\\end\n<$set name=\"setting\" filter=\"[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[in-story-controls]removeprefix[hide]]\" value=\"hide\" emptyValue=\"show\">\n<$reveal type=\"match\" text=\"show\" default=<>>\n
\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/InStoryControls]!has[draft.of]]\" variable=\"listItem\"><$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<> text=\"hide\"><$set name=\"tv-config-toolbar-class\" filter=\"[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]\"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>\n
\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/ViewTemplate": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/ViewTemplate", "caption": "MyStory Bookmarks ViewTemplate", "created": "20190118064731266", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "MyStory Bookmarks ViewTemplate", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body", "modified": "20190426131037332", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon-off": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon-off", "created": "20190118211823363", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037444", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon", "created": "20190115223227712", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037308", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab", "caption": "MyMarks", "created": "20190121194507035", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "MyMarks Tab", "modified": "20190426131037439", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define drop-actions()\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"MyMark\" $subfilter=\"+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]\"/>\n\\end\n
    \n<$list filter=\"[tag[MyMark]!has[draft.of]]\" history=\"$:/HistoryList\" storyview=\"pop\">\n
  • \n<$droppable actions=<>>\n
    \n \n
    \n
    <><>
    \n\n
    \n
    • \n\n
\n<$tiddler tiddler=\"\">\n<$droppable actions=<>>\n
\n \n
\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/icon", "caption": "MyStory icon", "created": "20190106092402457", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "MyStory Icon", "modified": "20190426131037436", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/left-arrow": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/left-arrow", "caption": "left arrow in circle", "created": "20190106110559867", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "left arrow in circle", "modified": "20190426131037432", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/macros", "caption": "MyStory Macros", "created": "20190118063746061", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "MyStory Macro Collection", "modified": "20190426131037428", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define my-link-text()\n<$transclude field={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##default-label}}><$transclude field=\"caption\"><$view field=\"title\"/> \n\\end\n\n\\define my-link()\n<$link to=<> tooltip=<>><$set name=\"tv-wikilinks\" value=\"no\"><>\n\\end\n\n\\define bookmark-icon()\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]tag[MyMark]]\">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon}}\n\\end\n\n\\define MyStoryBkmrkBtn()\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]!tag[MyMark]]\">\n<$checkbox tag=\"MyMark\" class=\"te-btn-inactive\">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon-off}}\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]tag[MyMark]]\">\n<$checkbox tag=\"MyMark\" class=\"te-btn-active\">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon}}\n\n\\end" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme", "caption": "MyStory Readme", "created": "20190105223039966", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037424", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! My Story\n\nA story list on steroids. Adds bookmarking and alternative labels for story-elements in sidebar tabs: \n\n* The [[MyMarks|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab]] tab shows links to bookmarked elements.\n* The [[MyStory|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab]] tab can replace the //Open// tab: The listing shows the title of a tiddler, if there is no caption field, the caption, if there is no other field as defined below.\n\n – `title` might be a good fallback :)\n\n!!! [[Usage settings|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]]\n\nControl active sidebar tabs:
\n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> <$text text={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab!!caption}}/>   \n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> <$text text={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab!!caption}}/>   \n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open!!caption}}
\n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent!!caption}}   <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Tools\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Tools!!caption}}   <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/SideBar/More\" tag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/More!!caption}}\n\nShow small buttons for every list entry:
\n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings\" index=\"show-edit-button\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> edit button
\n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings\" index=\"show-clone-button\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> clone button \n\n{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/DefaultSidebarTab}}\n\nClick the tag and arrange tabs via drag and drop:
\n<>\n\n!! In-Story Controls\n\nElements tagged <> can be added below every element (tiddler) in the story.
\n<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings\" index=\"in-story-controls\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\"> show in-story controls" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings": { "text": "{\n \"default-label\": \"e-name\",\n \"show-edit-button\": \"no\",\n \"last-closed\": \" $:/plugins/telmiger/PluginSize/lists\",\n \"show-clone-button\": \"no\",\n \"in-story-controls\": \"hide\"\n}", "type": "application/json", "created": "20190105223523663", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219123812289", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/styles.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/styles.css", "caption": "MyStory Styles", "created": "20190105221436571", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037416", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".te-nav-list {\n list-style: none;\n padding-left: 0;\n}\n\n\n/* icons */\n\n.te-nav-list svg {\n height: 1rem;\n width: 1rem;\n}\n\n.te-nav-list .tc-dirty-indicator svg {\n margin: 0 0.25rem -0.25rem 1rem;\n}\n\n\n/* buttons */\n\n.te-nav-list button.tc-btn-mini {\n margin-right: 0.5rem;\n}\n\n.my-story-footer .my-story-close-all-btn {\n margin-right: 1em;\n}\n\n.te-nav-list .my-story-btn {\n margin-left: 0.25rem;\n}\n\n/* bookmark icon */\n\n.my-bookmark-icon {\n margin-right: 0.33em;\n}\n\n\n/* bookmarks tiddler marker */\n\n.my-story-bkmrk {\n position: absolute;\n right: -0.1em;\n font-size: 2.1rem;\n}\n\n.my-story-bkmrk svg {\n height: 1.75em;\n max-width: 1.75em;\n}\n\n\n/* bookmarks buttons */\n\n.te-btn-inactive, .te-btn-active {\n cursor: pointer;\n}\n\n.te-nav-list .te-btn-inactive,\n.te-nav-list .te-btn-active {\n margin-right: .25rem;\n}\n\n.tc-tiddler-view-frame .te-btn-inactive {\n display: none;\n}\n\n.tc-tiddler-view-frame:hover .te-btn-inactive {\n display: initial;\n}\n\n.te-btn-active svg.my-bookmark {\n color: <>\n}\n\n.te-btn-active svg.my-bookmark:hover {\n color: rgba(123,123,123,0.3);\n fill: <>\n}\n\n.te-btn-active svg.my-bookmark:hover path.vertical-line {\n fill: transparent;\n}\n\n.te-btn-inactive svg.my-bookmark:hover {\n fill: <>\n}\n\n.te-btn-inactive svg.my-bookmark:hover path{\n color: <>\n}\n\n.te-btn-inactive input,\n.te-btn-active input {\n position: absolute;\n left: -100vw;\n}\n\n.my-bkmrks .te-btn-active {\n position: relative;\n top: -0.125rem;\n}\n\n/* InStory Controls*/\n\n.te-footerbar {\n text-align: right;\n border-bottom: 1px solid <>;\n padding: 0.25rem 0;\n}\n\n.te-footerbar button {\n font-size: 1.5rem;\n margin-left: 0.5rem;\n}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/support", "created": "20190121200320320", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037411", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/support}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab", "caption": "MyStory", "created": "20190101145705620", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "e-name": "MyStory Tab", "modified": "20190426131037407", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n\n\\define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/\n\n\\define editmode-icon() \n{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}\n\\end\n\n\\define my-close-btn() \n<$list filter=\"[all[current]!has[draft.of]]\" variable=\"title\" emptyMessage=<>>\n<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class=\"tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini\">\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings\" $index=\"last-closed\" $subfilter=\"+[[]] []\"/>\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-close-tiddler\"/>×</$button></$list>\n\\end\n\n\\define openMyTiddlers(filter)\n<$list filter=<<__filter__>> >\n<$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/>\n</$list>\n\\end\n\n\\define reopenBtn()\n<$list filter=\"[{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}minlength[1]]\">\n<$set name=\"tt\" value=\"reopen last closed element(s)\">\n<$button tooltip=<<tt>> class=\"tc-btn-invisible my-story-reopen-btn\">\n<$set name=\"qualstate\" value=\"$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver\">\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<qualstate>> text=\"bottom\">\n<<openMyTiddlers \"[enlist{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}]\">>\n</$reveal>\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<<qualstate>> text=\"bottom\">\n<<openMyTiddlers \"[enlist{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}reverse[]]\">>\n</$reveal>\n</$set>\n{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/left-arrow}}\n</$button>\n</$set>\n</$list>\n\\end\n\n\\define closeAllBtn()\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible my-story-close-all-btn\">\n<$set name=\"myStory\" filter=\"[list[$:/StoryList]]\" >\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings\" $index=\"last-closed\" $value=<<myStory>>/>\n</$set>\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-close-all-tiddlers\"/>\n<<lingo Button>>\n</$button>\n\\end\n\n\\define edit-btn()\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[show-edit-button]removeprefix[no]] ~[all[current]!has[draft.of]]\">\n<$list filter=[all[current]minlength[1]]>\n<span class=\"my-story-btn\">\n<$button message=\"tm-edit-tiddler\" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Caption}} class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>>\n{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}\n</$button>\n</span>\n</$list>\n</$list>\n\\end\n\n\\define clone-btn()\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[show-clone-button]removeprefix[no]] ~[all[current]!has[draft.of]]\">\n<$list filter=[all[current]minlength[1]]>\n<span class=\"my-story-btn\">\n<$button message=\"tm-new-tiddler\" param=<<currentTiddler>> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}} class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>>\n{{$:/core/images/clone-button}}\n</$button>\n</span>\n</$list>\n</$list>\n\\end\n\n\\define drop-actions()\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/StoryList\" $subfilter=\"+[insertbefore:currentTiddler<actionTiddler>]\"/>\n\\end\n\n<ul class=\"my-story te-nav-list\">\n<$list filter=\"[list[$:/StoryList]]\" history=\"$:/HistoryList\" storyview=\"pop\">\n<li><div style=\"position: relative;\">\n<$droppable actions=<<drop-actions>>>\n<div class=\"tc-droppable-placeholder\">\n \n</div>\n<div>\n<<my-close-btn>><<bookmark-icon>><<my-link>><<edit-btn>> <<clone-btn>>\n</div>\n</$droppable>\n</div>\n</li>\n</$list>\n</ul>\n<$tiddler tiddler=\"\">\n<$droppable actions=<<drop-actions>>>\n<div class=\"tc-droppable-placeholder\">\n \n</div>\n<footer class=\"my-story-footer\">\n<<closeAllBtn>>\n<<reopenBtn>>\n</footer>\n</$droppable>\n</$tiddler>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-above": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-above", "created": "20190128170540016", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037403", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<svg class=\"em-icon insert-above\" viewBox=\"0 0 22 22\" width=\"1em\" height=\"1em\" role=\"img\" aria-labelledby=\"title desc\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" style=\"fill-rule:evenodd;\"><title id=\"title\">{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Caption}}{{$:/language/Buttons/InsertAbove/Hint}}\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-below": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/ui/icons/insert-below", "created": "20190128165452603", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037399", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/support", "created": "20181103150753927", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426131037394", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Support the Author\n\n''Hi!'' I’m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :)\n\n---\n\n!!! One Time Support\n\nIf using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort:\n\nhttps://www.paypal.me/telmiger\n\n---\n\n!!! Permanent Support\n\nIf my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: \n\nhttps://www.patreon.com/telmiger\n\n---\n\n!!! Thank You\n\nSubstantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community!\n\n//Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.//\n\nIf you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you.\n\n''Thank you very much for your support!''
\n//Thomas//\n\nhttps://thomas-elmiger.ch" } } }
